website_summaries.verdict: Choose this Sceptre TV if your top priorities are image quality and affordability, and you don't mind adding an outboard speaker or soundbar to improve the audio.
pros: Practical, spacious 55-inch model for a decent price
Has 4 HDMI ports for adding ample equipment
Emits a bright, colorful display with crisp contrast and detail
cons: Motion refresh isn't the fastest, and will disappoint gamers who like fast action

customer_reviews.title: The image only lasted 7 months. Don't buy this brand.
customer_reviews.text: The picture on this tv went out after only having it for 7 months. I looked up Sceptre's warranty and I'm responsible for the cost of shipping to and from the company to get it repaired. Which will cost more than what I paid for it. I won't buy another Sceptre tv. I'll stick with brands that stand by their products and will last longer than 7 months.
customer_reviews.author: Toni W

customer_reviews.title: Great price 4K
customer_reviews.text: Great TV at a great price. Only negative was the picture used on description showed a VGA connection, however, there was not one. Had to upgrade to HDMI for display (needed to be done anyhow!).
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Good BASIC 4K display
customer_reviews.text: You get only what you pay for here. Among the sparse features are 4K display, CEC, HDCP, and... that is pretty much it. The 120Hz feature is emulated. The actual refresh rate is 60Hz. The good thing about purchasing this particular TV is that you aren't paying for "smart-tv" features that could be obsolete long before the TV has reached the end of its utility.
customer_reviews.author: ws62003

customer_reviews.title: I have to say I really love the picture of this TV
customer_reviews.text: I have owned LG, Sony and Samsung TV's. I have to say I really love the picture of this TV. It delivers a true 4k, beautiful picture. The 120hz is referring to the build in MEMC technology. It works by adding extra frames in between regular video frames for a smoother picture. Like you would get with a true 120hz TV. Sort of like the upscaleing vcr that changes regular DVD quality to BluRay quality. It works very well to give you a 120hz quality picture with just a 60hz TV. As for the sound. It works well, not super surround sound quality but it good. For the price of this 55" TV, you can't complain.
customer_reviews.author: AK1

customer_reviews.title: Sceptre Tv Good bang for the buck
customer_reviews.text: I bought this TV to replace a horrible Samsung 55 inch LED 3D TV. I had nothing but problems with Samsung including customer service. So I decided to purchase an inexpensive TV without the smart option because I use Apple TV anyways. This Sceptre TV fit the bill for under $400. The picture quality is great, but the sound is not good at all. Even after testing every single option, the sound did not improve. I purchased a Visio sound bar for $90 which works perfect with the TV. I can use only my Apple TV remote to control the entire setup including turning it on and off. I would definitely recommend this TV even with the bad sound.
customer_reviews.author: Klaus Kunkel

customer_reviews.title: 55 inches of real decent picture for $300 plus
customer_reviews.text: NOT bad for $300 plus bucks, the audio is crap, the remote and features are crap, but the picture is good and again 55 inches for $300 plus if you want a bunch of features this is not the tv, if you use some app or cable, use the features on it, picture is still great and it is a monster at 55 inches the stand[s] are kinda meager, prepare to put a strap on it or hang from wall, not sure why they cheapen the damn legs up, but not real hard to resolve but do make sure it is stable
customer_reviews.author: Babbitt's

customer_reviews.title: If you want a nice big, crisp 4k without all the bells and whistles
customer_reviews.text: One of the HDMI ports died after a couple months, but otherwise this is a great value for the money. Crisp and bright image, lightweight, solid performance
customer_reviews.author: thanby

customer_reviews.title: Nice picture, limited functionality, no frills.
customer_reviews.text: Great picture! No built in wireless internet connection. Provide your own FireTV, Chrome or other HDMI based connection. Only one USB port. 120hz and 4k through one special HDMI port.
customer_reviews.author: Austin Hammer

customer_reviews.title: Price was great for what you are getting
customer_reviews.text: I have had no problems of any kind with this product. Price was great for what you are getting. Sure it is missing some features the the more expensive tv's have, but think of this as a starter UHD TV. Use the optical out into a small amp and halfway decent speakers and you should be happy. BTW tech support was very responsive when I asked about whick HDMI port to connect my XBox 1S to.I do recomend a string of ambiant lighting LEDs. Will make this product really look like a great buy. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Lee A. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Good clear picture
customer_reviews.text: Nice picture, perfect TV if you don't need added functions. I have it hooked up to an apple TV, and external speakers. The speakers on the TV are really bad, but I don't need them either.
customer_reviews.author: J. Delgado

customer_reviews.title: TV works great. There is a hole in the back of ...
customer_reviews.text: TV works great. There is a hole in the back of the tv itself but it doesn’t effect the picture. The delivery person did just leave the tv sitting on my front porch and I feel as if I should have had to sign for this obvious package so it would not be stolen. Luckily I was home. But I would order this again. Thanks. If I had had to sign for the tv I would have given it 5 stars because it’s cheaper than Walmart and the picture is great.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Payne

customer_reviews.title: I don't care for bells and whistles. I just ...
customer_reviews.text: I don't care for bells and whistles. I just want a basic large screen tv with 4k. I am very tech savvy, so, I don't need/want anything else.
customer_reviews.author: Ric

customer_reviews.title: Tv came a little damaged ...
customer_reviews.text: Everything about this tv is great . Except - the packaging came extremely beat up - and there is a “blip” spot on my brand new tv that I don’t feel like shipping back - too much work. It is a spot on the tv that isn’t black and looks like a star . Its not super bright , so it’s passible. The picture quality on my Xbox one x is great. Sadly I can’t rate well with a blip lol. Kind of frustrating when trying to enjoy 4K for the first time .
customer_reviews.author: PJ

customer_reviews.title: Incredible value for an awesome TV!
customer_reviews.text: You absolutely would never guess how little we paid for this TV based on the quality. My fiancé and I love it! You have to find channels or movies in 4K to really fully appreciate the quality (but that is the case for all 4K TVs). We are so happy with it! The picture is amazing, the sound has a large range from super soft to really loud, and the value is incredible. It has plenty of inputs for cables, usbs, etc.
customer_reviews.author: laffer14

customer_reviews.title: best deal I've found for the money and a GREAT picture!
customer_reviews.text: VERY satisfied with this TV! Best for the money, period. This TV performs just as well as one at double the cost. So well in fact, that my friend saw mine and bought one.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Good tv 📺
customer_reviews.text: good Tv for price! When it got to my door it took me 20 minutes to get it inside. So make sure to have some help if you’re under 5’1 😂 Sound is alright but tbh it could be better. You’ll want to buy some surround sound speakers. It’s already technically got them installed inside but for me the quality of noise could be better. As for picture quality it’s like a 7.9 out of 10. Because it can get very loud but very weak bass and treble.
customer_reviews.author: Jobana P.

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: This is to the manufacturer. This was junk. I hqd it working for one night. One night. And the very next day the colors are inverted and there is nothing in setting to fix it. It did it on its own.
customer_reviews.author: Chad Franey

customer_reviews.title: BUYER BEWARE! SCEPTRE TV / MONITORS ARE JUNK!
customer_reviews.text: I bought a new Sceptre U55, 55' 4K Ultra HD TV from Amazon on February 28th, 2019. My new TV stopped working 87 days after purchasing it. This was my 3rd Sceptre TV/Monitor that died in less than a year after purchase. It is also the last Sceptre product I'll ever own. Sceptre products are junk and are a waste of your money.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Belli

customer_reviews.title: Can't Beat It
customer_reviews.text: Paired it with an fairly inexpensive mount and for the price there is no way to beat. My only criticism is that the screen is a bit more reflective than I would have liked but I don't think this warrants reducing it by a full star.
customer_reviews.author: MWC

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and Dumb (just like me)
customer_reviews.text: This TV is phenomenal. It cuts out the BS and gives you 4K at a price point that blows my mind. I plugged in some speakers (the default ones are hilariously bad), a refurbished 4K Roku, and my PC (the TV has a "gaming" preset that almost completely eliminates latency), and I have a cheap and easy living room setup that 99.9% of the world couldn't distinguish from a $10,000 home theater. Can't recommend this TV enough.
customer_reviews.author: Hugh B. Smith

customer_reviews.title: So dissapointed in this.
customer_reviews.text: Glad I bought an extended warranty for this died after 18 months, the back light went out. Regarding this when it worked, it just can't handle fast motion. Picture pixelates to an unacceptable degree. Sound quality from the built in speakers is really terrible. I'm going to contact Sceptre to see if they will stand behind their products and replace this.
customer_reviews.author: rmshap

customer_reviews.title: 2nd TV is good. Its a cheap big TV
customer_reviews.text: First order of this TV had a black dot on the screen. I emailed the seller, sent it back and they shipped out another one right away. 2nd TV is good. Its a cheap big TV. Its doing what it needs to do. I would recommend to anyone who is on a strict budget and wants a large TV. Picture is of good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after only 9 months of use
customer_reviews.text: Bought this TV to place in family room. Initially was extremely pleased with the TV. But for no apparent reason it just stopped working. Won't turn on. We've only had it 9 months . Now I will begin the warranty hassle. Hopefully the company will be responsive. I will update.
customer_reviews.author: Ruthn3333

customer_reviews.title: Sharp picture
customer_reviews.text: The only drawback I have with this TV so far is it's own sound quality, very "tinny". So I connected a powered set of Surround Speakers to it, now everything is fine. Just be picky as to who you order it from, had to order from two companies to get it.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne Maden

customer_reviews.title: Ok for price
customer_reviews.text: it’s a good tv for the price. I’d complain about the sound quality but we hook up our laptop, where our movies downloaded, so I don’t know if it’s the movie, the laptop or the tv. Our smaller one of the same brand seems fine
customer_reviews.author: Kellie

customer_reviews.title: No frills display worth its price.
customer_reviews.text: Got this on sale for under 4 bills. I am not a big fan of the TVs with all the extras. I want a solid display, thats it. This does have some extras I guess, but its not the selling point in my opinion. The color looks good, over all a very nice picture.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Duffey

customer_reviews.title: Great value for money
customer_reviews.text: Had this 6 months and found it excellent for the price. Sometimes the sound can be iffy but I just turn it off and on again and it fixes the problem straight away. I am sure if you compare it to a $1500 TV theres a difference but I have found this great value for money and would highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: madeleine W

customer_reviews.title: Why complain? 💰
customer_reviews.text: Picture quality could be better and can be enhanced through (cable,etc.) provider video features on the remote but for the price it's pretty good! Complaining for the prove paid is petty! I'm happy!😊
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Ruben G. Zuniga Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy from these people.
customer_reviews.text: Had problems with the TV just a few weeks after getting it. They were no help at all. Also, the sound doesn't work right, and instead of it being new, it was a 2015 TV!
customer_reviews.author: Jeanine Gibbs

customer_reviews.title: Love love love my tv
customer_reviews.text: I am the envy of all of my friends. This is a seriously high quality TV for a fraction of the big brands price. Picture is amazing. I got a scepter sound bar based on the reviews and have no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra Hightower

customer_reviews.title: Love my TV
customer_reviews.text: Love my TV! Great picture, plenty of inputs and easy to use. Plus the 4yr service plan is very reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: Raven

customer_reviews.title: Amazing TV But you might need a sound bar
customer_reviews.text: bought this tv and it has been amazing. Amazing customer service. Safe Shipping which required a direct signature. Amazing picture quality. The only thing wrong with this tv is the sound quality isn't that great however a cheap sound bar fixed that issue quick. Gaming and movies are outstanding this tv was definitely worth every penny
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great for the price, I did come with one pixel out
customer_reviews.author: Michael Roemer

customer_reviews.title: Great picture.
customer_reviews.text: I love this TV. Picture is great. Sound is not great, but sound bar fixed that issue. Great to for the price. Very satisfied over all.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia McKinney

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy Great Picture Fast Delivery Very Pleased
customer_reviews.text: This is a great buy i must say, i cracked the screen on my Samsung 4k curve tv and didn't wanna break bank getting another one so got this as an alternative and the picture is honeslty better than the Samsung's the quality of pixels are not as refined but thats me being a tech guy u wouldn't even notice anyway great buy and it came sooner than expected
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I sent to my son in the Air Force. He loves it. It arrived safely. No damage.
customer_reviews.author: Sgt Momma

customer_reviews.title: Good value for price
customer_reviews.text: It is what it is. It’s a cheap tv don’t expect Sony or Samsung quality picture. It’s great value for the price if the quality is not everything to you. It’s not to me, I wanted it for size and price
customer_reviews.author: Josh Martin

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Amazing that such a great tv is available for $330. Hooked it to Apple TV and through a sound system. Totally satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: LAT

customer_reviews.text: I don't know what happen with my item expected may 23, today is may 25
customer_reviews.author: Felix javier

customer_reviews.title: Its a big screeb
customer_reviews.text: Sounds like a** but since i use it for my pc with a headset DOESNT matter
customer_reviews.author: Codythepoor

customer_reviews.title: Crud
customer_reviews.text: Has a bar in screen can’t watch more than one hour or can’t see half of the screen
customer_reviews.author: Anthony christner

customer_reviews.title: stripped screws but very nice picture.
customer_reviews.text: Pictures great and arrived a week early! We got 2 tvs but one of the tvs spots for the screw were stripped and so we had to figure something out. other than that great tvs so far and very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Spectre 55”
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding value great price great picture Couldn’t ask for more
customer_reviews.author: joseph gerber

customer_reviews.title: pkged nicely. e excellent quality video
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in time, pkged nicely.e excellent quality video. Right now, I have a blue ray player and fire tv connected with no problems.
customer_reviews.author: S. B.

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: Just wanted a TV for the basement and to connect gaming systems to. Serves its purpose and I've had it for a few months with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Girl Next Door

customer_reviews.title: Great tv.  Sound needs improvment.
customer_reviews.text: Great tv for the price. Only complaint is the sound is very poor. Even with 15 min of adjusting. But still a great tv for the price. Get external speakers.
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Picture for the money
customer_reviews.text: Picture is wonderful, i mean it really is for the money. However youll need to hook up a speaker cause the sound is ****
customer_reviews.author: Chase Davis

customer_reviews.title: for the price I think its an amazing deal! Sound and picture are great
customer_reviews.text: I've only had it for one day so knock on wood that nothing goes wrong. However, for the price I think its an amazing deal! Sound and picture are great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I did was hooked up a sound bar 👍👍😊😊
customer_reviews.author: Tim Gruskovak

customer_reviews.title: ... gift for my son and his wife and they love it.
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift for my son and his wife and they love it.
customer_reviews.author: Polly Vee

customer_reviews.title: Don't bother
customer_reviews.text: Spend your money elsewhere. Worked well for several months, then black blobs started scrolling through one section of the screen. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Jules

customer_reviews.title: Audio sucks but hige TV and great price
customer_reviews.text: TV it's self I huge but the audio if weird idk a sound bar fixed that up right away but for the price yeah it's a good thing just the audio sucks
customer_reviews.author: andrew Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY, IF YOU WANT IT FOR ONLY 11 months
customer_reviews.text: I never leave Amazon reviews. But I was honestly aggravated to know that right at the 1 year mark this TV stopped working and of course they will not honor and return. The TV was used maybe 6-8x during the year i owned it, it sat in a guest room on a surge proteector so no way it could have been from a storm outage. Very disappointed in this brand
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Continue doing such a great job
customer_reviews.text: It's a great TV very big with an excellent picture quality,the price is awesome I still don't believe I could find so much quality at that price
customer_reviews.author: Yanelis

customer_reviews.title: Prompt arrival and easy set up
customer_reviews.text: The picture is great but best of all I didn't need any added speakers or sound bar.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Kay

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 6 months BEWARE!
customer_reviews.text: This TV broke after 6 months. The screen is completely pixelated and useless. Luckily Amazon refunded me. I would not recommend this brand.
customer_reviews.author: JET

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I was very surprised for not being a known top brand
customer_reviews.author: Lloyd Hough

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Sounds and looks great and it came in way before the expected delivery date super recommended
customer_reviews.author: shalimar

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up out of the box. Picture is great.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Boone

customer_reviews.title: Good value as basic tv. Would have to upgrade for home theater
customer_reviews.text: Like sceptre products nice picture but sound is a bit dicey
customer_reviews.author: Cary Gray

customer_reviews.title: TV Great...Speaker not so much
customer_reviews.text: Great TV for $400.00 No apps on this one so not a "Smart TV" but I have a Fire TV connected to it so no need. The speaker is however the worst sounding TV speaker I have ever heard. You will definitely be needing an external speaker with this. I almost wonder why even put one in your TV if it is of such poor quality. It detracts from what otherwise is a great TV.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: Maybe not the best quality TV
customer_reviews.text: I was really looking forward to getting this TV, however, after a week of use, I notice a white hue coming from the right corner of the TV. The picture quality is okay, but not the 4K experience it was hyped up to be. Don't know if I'd get another one of these brands.
customer_reviews.author: clara villalobos

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Not a good picture, blurry, and not worth the money, company did take it back.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great TV
customer_reviews.text: I bought this tv for my husband. He loves it. It was easy to hook up and has a great picture.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl B

customer_reviews.title: The visuals are good. Prices is good
customer_reviews.text: The visuals are good. Prices is good. As many reviews point out, it is 60Hz refresh rate. Sound sucks. It sounds like your listening through a tube. If you invest into a good sound system, than that doesn't matter.
customer_reviews.author: jared keener

customer_reviews.title: Looks amazing
customer_reviews.text: Simply the best 4k TV you can buy for the price
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love it.
customer_reviews.text: It arrived a day late but was worth the wait. I’ve looked for few months for a tv this size and this was an awesome price (I paid $328.00) . People have said the sound quality isn’t good but I disagree. My boyfriend and I have hearing problems but not with this tv. Great sound great picture great price.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffiney K

customer_reviews.title: Awful, Awful Awful, did I say how awful it is?
customer_reviews.text: This has one of the worst pictures I have ever seen. The volume will not work and each time I turn it on I have to go through setup to get the remote or manual buttons to work. It's very blurry even with it plugged into the 4k hdmi slot. Pass this by and don't stop!
customer_reviews.author: G. Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Loving my new tv
customer_reviews.text: Love this tv the 4K isn't full 4K but for the price it looks amazing it's a great size amazing sound quality. Lots of options for picture settings and the remote supports sound bar controls
customer_reviews.author: Donovan D.

customer_reviews.title: Its an okay tv
customer_reviews.text: Its okay.. You get what you paid for. We have issues with the sound not working sometimes. And having to turn the tv off. And then back on it normal works.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Cardino

customer_reviews.title: Its good, but it takes a little bit to ling ...
customer_reviews.text: Its good, but it takes a little bit to ling to connect to my pc. I mean showing an actual image. But definitely satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Zinkgraf

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: This TV is really big and works well in the room we put it in. The picture is very clear.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah M. Newton

customer_reviews.title: not the best quality but good for the price
customer_reviews.text: it's okay, not the best quality but good for the price. To get a decent picture it will take some time adjusting settings.
customer_reviews.author: Drew

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Such an amazing TV! Set up with a chromecast to watch whatever I want. 4K is beautiful.

customer_reviews.title: Picture quality sucks - not 4K at all
customer_reviews.text: Horrible picture. Only functions as 60htz at most! Tried to return but they refused. Do NOT buy this.
customer_reviews.author: Sawyer

customer_reviews.title: Not internet-ready
customer_reviews.text: In my rush to get a good deal on this product, I overlooked the fact that it is not internet-ready. Otherwise, the picture is OK, I am simply limited in what I can watch until I find an Amazon Firestick that does not require Alexa (I am not a fan of Alexa-type devices).
customer_reviews.author: MA

customer_reviews.title: okay deal.
customer_reviews.text: Good TV! Title was initially misleading with respect to the refresh rate.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: the quality is great, especially considering the price
customer_reviews.text: Once I figured out the display settings, the quality is great, especially considering the price. Using as a pc monitor. As others pointed out, it only reaches 60hz for 4k. Works for me though.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Not what's in the description.. it's not120hz .. it's all a lie

customer_reviews.text: I like the tv but why is there white like clouds on it at the top right when it's dark screen it might need looked at bad pixil.

product_meta.title: Sceptre U550CV-UMR 55-Inch 4K Ultra HD MEMC 120 LED UTV 3840 x 2160 - Black
product_meta.description:
Take in the scenery as 8 million pixels illuminate a world of endless color and stunning detail. Sceptre 4K Ultra High-Definition displays have 4 times the number of pixels as a Full HD display, turning your shows into an epic UHD viewing experience. The unequalled color and clear brilliance of 4k will provide more natural and lifelike images than have ever been viewed on a 55” screen. 4 HDMI ports allow you to connect up to four devices at once, so you can stream, browse, and listen to all of your favorite multimedia. The HDMI 2.0 ports allow you to seamlessly stream 4k video to get the most rewarding viewing experience that is available on the market. Explore your apps on this giant LED screen once you connect your smartphone or tablet to the Mobile High-Definition Link (MHL) port (HDMI 1). The innovative USB port further expands functionality, allowing users to listen to music and view digital pictures quickly and conveniently.

AMAZON.COM
feature_bullets: Ultra HD UHD 3840 x 2160 Resolution; Ultra Slim Design^4X HDMI^MHL With ROKU Ready^USB Port^120 Hz Refresh Rate

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars202 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
